I have already emailed you twice today, and I cant get to the sliding menu since YOU BLOCKED MY ACCOUNT! Nice move Rebtel, asking me something I can not provide to make it look like it is my fault for not providing you a ticket number...

title: I was about to subscribe for their …
text: I was about to subscribe for their service.. But the reviews saved me.. Thank you all for helping me choose wisely..!!!
answer: Hi Gaurav,We’re sorry to hear you got discouraged to try our service, but we want to let you know than many of the comments are based on a communication misunderstanding due to confusions and those people who contacted us through our support team have been taken care of.Keep in mind that it is usually unhappy customers who comment. Happy users who enjoy the service and rarely voice their satisfaction on such a forum. According to our user satisfaction study 98% of our customer base is satisfied. We hope you decide to try so you can take your own conclusions!Regards,/Pilar.

title: Update:   Hello,   I got my credits back now. Thank you for that. I am a bit apprehensive of the fact that it was possible for my credits to disappear and only to re-appear when I raised a complaint.
text: I have only been with Rebtel for a few months when I was introduced to their services.  I have an auto top-up which means my account gets replenished monthly.  The last top-up was 08/06/2017 which was for 170minutes. I have used less than 50mins out this total.  However, today I tried to make a call but each time I get the message that there is another on- going call on my account. Now my credit has been exhausted! I believe my account has been compromised. I am cancelling my subscription immediately.You have fraudsters in your mix!Very sad!  NB: I sent the message above to your support, no reply as we speak!
answer: Dear Temi,Update: We're glad it got sorted! If you ever need help, you can always write to us at support@rebtel.com and we'll gladly help!I can see from your account that you still have 124 minutes left. You can check it at any time by logging in to your Rebtel account, also from "subscriptions" on your Rebtel app.We just replied to your private message #1200763 with some information about the reasons that could be generating this issue, please check your email and share with us the answers to our questions by replying to that email so we can figure out what´s going on and help you out. Thanks in advance!Best regards,/Pilar.

title: On 6/4/17 Invalid charges on my account!

Thanks in advance for your cooperation!Best regards,/Pilar.

title: Iren Horvath
text: Hi My name Iren Horvath We  Rebtel join only 1 month For £7 pound every month But now every month £8:40 Gone I don't like Very bad experience with Rebtel
answer: Hi Iren,Rebtel charges VAT according to the country where you are using the service from. For example, if you are using the service from the UK, VAT will be charged at 20%, 19% from Germany and 21% from Spain. If you buy £7 world credit from the UK, you will pay £8,40 in total (£1,40 VAT).We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with us, Could you please elaborate why did you say that? We would like to improve it.Please be so kind to email us at support@rebtel.com providing us with a detailed description of your experience so we can assist you in the best possible way. Thank you in advance!Regards,/Pilar.

title: VERY BAD EXPERIENCE WITH REBTEL........!!!!!!
text: Hi, My name is Neil Waters.I made a payment on my phone today (06/05/2017) and added the subscription to call India unlimited for $10 (US) and every time i try to make a call using the phone number it keeps on saying please enter the number and then my pin and beeps 4 times and call gets disconnected. On the app, under "CHOOSE YOUR CONNECTION", when i remove the PHONE LINES option, the call gets connected using WIFI or CELLULAR DATA, and the call reception is extremely bad and poor in quality........and the call drops frequently.I used to be able to call INDIA directly using the PHONE LINES connection on my cell phone and the call quality was good.....I did not have to use WIFI or CELLULAR DATA before.......What you guys can do is, refund me the $10 (US) and will re-do the subscription again online, maybe then the problem will be solved.I mailed you guys several time but you guys still haven't replied. Can you guys please contact me by call 16474570045My receipt no. : 1d415ed0-72a8-4317-a7c8-2c5c2f7a2646
answer: Dear Neil, I answered you yesterday through your previous request on Trust Pilot and on the ticket number #1193204.As we explained, the problem is that you are calling from a number with a hidden caller id or a number unknown to us, then you will need to enter your registered number and PIN number each time you make a call for the system to be able to recognize you.I could see that you have two different accounts with us, please make sure that you logged in to your app by entering the correct registered number on the account where you payed the product and that number should be the same as the one you have on your sim card for the system works as it is intended.Remember that if you are calling from a device without sim card you will not be able to connect your calls through "phone lines".We can continue assisting you from the ticket number #1193204, please check you email and send us the information we required to help you out. Thanks for your help and understanding!Regards,/Pilar.

title: Hello
text: Hello, i am writing this review regarding the auto top up which is switched on by it self many times, the last time you chaatged me 10$ from my account which it had no enough funds at that time so i got also overdraft chaarges of 35$ , please give me money back or i am going to stop using the app and claim a complain to my bank regarding this charges
answer: Dear Mohammed,We have updated your complaint number #1193919. I have double checked your account and I can see that the latest $10 USD payment was not a result of the auto recharge. Instead it was a payment made over the phone.Bear in mind that since your credit card is stored, you can credit your account through the voice operator.You are for example talking on the phone and your credit goes below 1 USD, you will hear the operator's voice telling you that credit is low and to please credit your account. If your credit card is stored on your account you will have the option to top up (by for example pressing the '*' key (for the main menu) and then the '3' key to add credit over the phone).We have refunded your remaining balance. The funds should be returned in 3-5 business days.We hope this clears things up!Best regards,/Pilar.

title: I have been using rebtel for a longtime …
text: I have been using rebtel for a longtime now. They have been charging me £10 and over instead of  $10. I have tried to contact them but no response. This is a rip off companyI need my refund for all the overpayment i have made since i joined rebtel. It is not just one transaction. Thank you
answer: Dear Abe Tan,We just replied to your private message. We can solve your problem there!I can see that one of my colleagues took care of you only one hour after you contacted us through the ticket number #1191553, we generally answer in 24h. Please understand that we have not been ignoring you and that we did our best to solve your problem.My colleague refunded the payment to you and disabled the auto recharge that you had enabled on 2017-05-07 with your last purchase. However the payment was made through the voice operator while you were talking on the phone and your credit goes below $1 USD, when you hear the operator's voice telling you that credit is low and to please credit your account by pressing the '*' key (for the main menu) and then the '3' key to add credit over the phone, and it was what happened.The currency on your account is US Dollar, you need to change it to the same as the one you have on your bank account (British pound GBP). To change your currency just log into your account at www.rebtel.com and click on your name. Click on "My Account", then on "My Profile" and make the change in the currency field. I have now made this for you, so you should not experience the same issue again.Best regards,/Pilar.

title: The worst company
text: Updated review as at 17/06/17:-Further to my earlier review, I intent to provide some further update regarding the awful service Rebtel provide. I noticed that you just rated your last call with 1 out of 5 stars on its quality. Something didn't work for you and I want to understand why. Not only because I want to fix any technical issues straight away, but more importantly because offering you the best call quality is my number 1 priority. So, help me understand what went wrong: Were you calling from home or on the go?Does it only happen when you call that specific number?If this was the first time the problem happened, what was different this time?I really want to solve the problem so anything you can tell me is a HUGE help and I really appreciate it. Thank you for taking the time :) /Sophie"Once you provide the info. nothing else happens! Because its f...g rebtel, they don't care about the customer experience as long as they get the monthly charge!My intention is to give this co a lesson before I cancel the subscription!The worst company, the worst possible customer customer service and its very expensive. Please DON'T GIVE A PENNY TO THIS FAKE COMPANY.Each time I report that I cannot make a call , I get an automated message saying "please provide details of your call"once I provide the details I get no more reply. I have an unlimited account with Rebtel to call Bangladesh but I couldn't make any calls in the last two days. When I kept reporting the issues I no longer get a reply even. Rebtel as a company you're disgusting and have disgraceful customer service. We all should boycott you!You're saying you can't locate my account , my phone number is 00447878075930, I have lodged 20 complaints and one standard copied message and no solution! Because I lodged complaints from mobile there is no ticket number. However I am sure Rebtel can check how many I begged them to sort out my connection, AWFUL COMPANY, YOU SHOULD BE SHAMED FOR YOUR SERVICE !Updated on 23/05/17: Rebtel have deactivated my subscription after writing this review. When asked why they have cancelled my unlimited calls subscription, their reply were we can't allow you to make unlimited calls ON AN UNLIMITED PLAN because it is not sustainable.
answer: Dear Alexander David,We have contacted you through the message number #1204377. We made some adjustments to improve the quality of your calls. Please check your email, we can solve your problem there!Best regards,/Pilar.

title: Not so much for me
text: it never worked for me. Probably because I didn't understand how it should work. I need to do it while I was overseas.  I don't understand what friction is I just know I was unable to use it.
answer: Dear Karen,We are very sorry if it was hard to understand how the service works.If you want to call while you are overseas, Rebtel is perfect for you if you have access to a WiFi connection and have installed the app on your phone since Rebtel doesn't handle roaming and you can be charged extra fees by your operator for it. Just make sure to change the settings from both your native phone and the app as follow:1. Native settings: turn off the roaming data to avoid any extra cost from your operator and enable only your WiFi connection.2. On the Rebtel app: change your preferred calling method from "Settings" (the last icon to the right) to “WiFi” and also select "Avoid roaming charges".Feel free to contact us at support@rebtel.com if more information needed.Best regards,/Pilar.

title: Complete scam - Rebtel unlimited
text: Complete Rebtel scam. They say unlimited, but they block your calls after 30 calls.Dear Rebtel, please say it's 30 calls per month, don't say 'UNLIMITED' - you complete liar.
answer: Dear Raja,You can call as long as you want, but you cannot reach as many numbers as you wish or it is seen as a business behaviour which is not allowed by our service. Unfortunately, due to misuses of our service, we had to set up these rules.The limitation is quite above of what a regular user does, so as long as you call a normal quantity of unique numbers, you shouldn't experience this issue again. The information about this limitation is displayed when you click on the unlimited subscription. You may still call the numbers you have called up until now and your account will be reset when your next unlimited month will be activated.Best regards,/Pilar.

answer: Dear Monica,We are constantly working on price reduction while still maintaining our excellent call quality and we´d love to offer cheaper rates but unfortunately the price depends also on the local infrastructure, and that's what happened with Nigeria. This price increase affects all calling providers and unfortunately, we’re no exception. However, your suggestion will be carefully noted and we will make sure that it reaches the correct Team within our organization.Hopefully the price will go down soon!Best regards,/Pilar.

title: The service is a rip off
text: The service is a rip off.  It was reliable and trustworthy until about 2 months ago, then it became a joke. There are so many issues, including variable call quality, dropping calls but the biggest issue is  auto connections via a credit card, even when you cancel the card. I spent almost £150  , when I would normally spend about £40 just because they changed the system so that even though you have credits they take money via the phone when you dial, even if you cancel auto top up. The  staff 'investigate' but came back with woolly explainations that don't explain how the system has recently changed. Do not ever use your credit card wth these bandits, as even if you cancel they still retain your details and will charge you for connecting or making a call without any sensible reasoning. I will never trust them again and will be reporting them to trading standards.

text: DONT USE REBTEL. THEY ARE A FRAUD.I am in Ireland and have used Rebtel for a while. Recently they locked my account and when I try to log on it comes up with a "restricted number" message. title: Call quality
text: Call quality - AverageBe Careful while you do the subscription... their website is dodgy, you might have unsubscribed the deal but you will be charged money. Secondly, they have a useless subscription called 'World Credits' which charges you more than the prevalent deals for specific countries. When you opt for recharge over phone, you will not be subscribed to your preferred country deal rather be parked on World Credit. You will keep talking on that useless world credit subscription which will get as it is outside the deal. This is a clear cut unethical practice by Rebtel and monopoly. I am waiting for a competitor to come on board to switch over soon.
answer: Dear Sandy,When you want to top up your account, you can buy two different products: World Credit to call anywhere, or a Subscription to a specific country.If you buy World Credit, your call will be charged following our regular rates, if you buy a Subscription you will get the specified minutes for the country of your choice. This way, those people who call many countries will save more credit buying World Credit instead of several Subscriptions, so they pay for what they use.So when you make a purchase the system does not check what country you call, simply manage the purchase you are doing. Also the auto renewal can only be managed by the user, so please make always sure that all the options are enabled/disabled according to your choice.Feel free to contact us emailing us at support@rebtel.com if more information needed.Best regards,/Pilar.

title: Misleading.. be aware
text: They say they are honest and all the good adjectives but what they dont say is they will increase your tariff after a month and that £7 does not include VAT charges.. answer: Hello Ashish,Rebtel charges VAT according to the country where you are using the service from. For example, if you are using the service from the UK, VAT will be charged at 20%, 19% from Germany and 21% from Spain. If you buy £5 world credit from the UK, you will pay £6 in total (£1 VAT).However, your suggestion will be noted and we will pass it to the right department so they are aware of our customers opinion about this. Thanks for your feedback.Best regards,/Pilar.

title: I had a very Bad experience with Rebtel and Cheated me
text: They have given advertisement on the web to call india 10$ for One month and 7 days. Opened the account on 3rd July and fed my credit card details on my Rebtel account then they gave a link to download their APPS but the beauty is that Link did not work and tried for two weeks to download their apps meanwhile they have taken 10USD from my account even though you were not using their services and No customer service number also but when i chatting thru Customer support, did not get proper solution after downloaded their application in two weeks, just used their service only two days, On next day when i am calling to India, says no enough credit to call India, approached customer support  why i could not make call? do you know what they said CathyDo you have a credit on  your local phone plan?I have taken a look at your account and I see no apparent reason why you are unable to call.The first thing we kindly ask you is to make sure that you have enough credit on your phone (not on the Rebtel account); Since you have to pay for the local call to our numbers with your local minutes while the international cost of the call is deducted from your prepaid Rebtel credit.Why i should pay my local numbers, then i realised, i am completely cheated by them
answer: Hi Rajuy,We are sorry for the confusion, let us explain: when you use Rebtel to call with the local minutes option you pay to your local provider the cost of a local call and to Rebtel the international part, which is a very low fee.If you call with Rebtel and using data (WiFi, 3G or 4G) then you pay nothing to your local provider and only pay to Rebtel the low fee for your international call.You can choose which option you want to use to call, and switch between them at any time.Please send us a private message via our Facebook Rebtel Help page: facebook.com/RebtelHelp providing your account details (ph number and email address registered) and we will explain hoe to switch between local minutes and data calls, and definitively take a second look at your credit.Thank you!W.

title: If you are new to Rebtel, do NOT use it.
text: If you are new to Rebtel, please do NOT use it. I used to recommend it to my friends, but I will NEVER do that again. There are so many other options out there. It might cost you a bit more, but you can stay out of future trouble.In my case, I could no longer to log in from my mobile app since they turned their logo upside down. It's been months. Thanks to Google, I was able to find out their well buried 'Report a Problem' button and send a few messages. At first, I received replies with staff's names listed in the end of the messages, though the replies are not for my issues, or just a product of 'copy and paste' in my opinion. As it went on, I could only receive automatic replies generated by system itself. As for now, I filled another web form days ago, no response, even from a machine, yet.Their new logo is shiny, so is their new website. However, if you dare look for their contact information, you are assured of disappointment. Except for a 'Report a problem' button, you will find nothing else. If you are lucky enough, you will receive their machine-generated replies, or nothing at all.You can smell it that the 'machine' is still running there, but the people who run it are absent. Imagine that. How cool it is to let the 'system' itself solve all problems for you.
answer: Hi Scyllar,We are sorry to hear you've had trouble reaching our support agents, apologies for that.Please let us know how can we help you via our email address support@rebtel.com or contacting us via private message through our Facebook Rebtel Help page: www.facebook.com/RebtelHelp. We'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you,Wanda.

title: My first month bill is 98 Euro..
text: Am using smartmobile sim card and using the rabtel application i have called to India last month and today i have received an bill from Smartmobile and the bill amount is 98 Euro , this is really bad service total disappointed with the service , now is there any way that i can avoid paying 98Euro
answer: Hi!When you call through our app, you can choose between connecting your calls with local minutes of WiFi. If you choose local minutes, your call gets connected via our Access Number. This means that you will be charged by your local carrier the price of a local call (depending on your calling plan).For more information about charges related to the use of your operator's services (3G and local minutes), we recommend you to consult them directly as we do not have access to that information.To avoid this charge choose "WiFi" as a calling method.If you have any other question you can reach us in our Rebtel Help in Facebook./Fernando.

title: Your account has been restricted - they restricted my private account, my account for business calls and several of my friends (I recomended Rebtel to them) also
text: My complaint is regarding Rebtel VOIP provider.Rebtel is a VOIP provider (they provide affordable calls to international numbers) with local access numbers.First you register (with your own telephone number from your country) for their service, buy a minimal credit of 5€ + EU tax, and then you enter an international number you wish to call, and Rebtel gives you an local number. When you call this local number that Rebtel gave you (you can only call it from your own number that you register with), Rebtel will connect you with an international number you wish to call.Like I said, first you need to register (enter it to Rebtel system via web interface) your own number (from wich you will be calling) and also that international number that you wish to call.Everything went well and everything was O.K. for first 100 minutes, which they charged me per minute at their calling rate price. Then Rebtel start to make this harassments and demands to tell them what is this number that I am calling (it was just one Estonian mobile number), to whom this number belongs, and why am I calling just and only this number (?!).Also they suspended my account (I can not make calls anymore, although I still have valid balance, and I paid for this service upfront), telling me that it is for my own protection. I do not understand why, as I registered all numbers in their system, and I paid for this service, therefor, I should call whoever I want. But Rebtel thinks that I should explain to them why am I calling this number, and who is the owner of this Estonian mobile number that I was calling! Outrageous!Also, I recomended several of my friends (because until now I was really satisfied with the quality of their service and price), and one of them got suspended also!When they suspend you, you got an automatic e-mail telling you that you are suspended, and you can not login, or make new calls even if you have balance and you paid for this service upfront. You have to write them and ask why they suspended you and why you can not use this service that you paid for, then you have to wait for their answer, and then this harrassment started.I believe that I did not done anything wrong, I registered and paid for this service, I was calling Estonian mobile number and they charged me per minute at their calling rate price. But, as I said, after 100 minutes they suspended my account and started to harassment me with these questions and asked me to provide them with some informations that was not their concern.I paid for the service, they charged me, and therefore, I should call whoever I want, even this is one Estonian number, without explaining myself to anyone. I did not done anything wrong. But no, they suspended my account and they started to harassment me.My friend has also the same problem. We selected Rebtel as they have the most affordable calling rates for Estonia, and they provided you with local number to call. So it was really affordable, and I would (and I did!) recommended Rebtel to anyone, but then this started.So I writting this complaint to let everyone know what did Rebtel done and what can you expect from Rebtel.
answer: Hi Dinko,The Estonian number you were trying to reach is a Premium number we do not support in Rebtel. With our service you can call any regular Estonian number (mobiles and landlines) but we do not support calls to Premium numbers yet.We asked you for owner of the number to be able to understand if it is a private number or if it belongs to some kind of company or administration. In the future we may offer a special rates for Estonian Premium numbers, but we do not know when this will be possible. We have opened your Rebtel account. I have just updated your ticket 937332 with all the information, check your inbox for more details.Thanks for your help!/Fernando.

title: Rebtel Charging customer's credit card without consent!
text: Seems like Rebtel are engaged in an completely unfair business practice to dupe the customers.They don't give customers any option to enroll into any auto debit option during subscription renewal or take any consent from the customers to charge the linked credit cards. They charged my credit card 10 USD automatically without my consent and their customer support is saying it is by default enabled and I had to manually go inside and search from where that option is and disable the same during each subscription renewal!! They say as per their policy charged amount can not be disabled!! So policy also made to dupe customers. How come charging customers linked credit card be a default option without customer's consent..is it not grossly unfair and shabby?!After reading some similar experiences from other customers here, I got confirmed this is Rebtel's tricks to siphon out money from unsuspecting customers!!
answer: Hi Souren!When you subscribe to one of our deals (India Unlimited in your case) the auto renewal gets activated (since this product is a subscription). However, at any moment you can cancel the subscription from your Rebtel account. You can also contact us and we will cancel it for you if you prefer.I can see the subscription has been cancelled in your account and it will not be renewed again.Best regards/Fernando.

title: Borderline scamming
text: Even worse than I thought.  Belligerence of customer service to do anything except write emails amounting to "it's you who are at fault for our overbilling, do this, do that etc., et.,. Rebtel has no understanding of their billing process with credit card issuers. No more patience for this kindergarten operation. Turned over to AM EX to handle all.Signed up for service, started at $5.00 per month to Eastern Europe.  Fee changed to who knows what since they don't want to say.  Incurred 3 charges of $25 x 3 ($75) in 1 month .  Called AM EX to challenge the extra costs, Rebtel locked my service and said they wouldn't do anything until I "undisputed" the charges.  Customer non service service doesn't seem to understand English based on the nonsensical answers that does not address the issues, much less  provide customer service. Maybe this is a garage operation?
answer: Hi Sylvia!We have located the ticket you sent us and reviewed your case. It seems like three payments of 25USD were added by mistake in your Rebtel account, but we can assure you these payments were not made by Rebtel. We will be happy to make a refund as soon as the dispute is cancelled.We have updated the ticket #935241 with more details.Thanks for your help!/Fernando.

I have asked the non-existent customer service department to kindly advise me what is going on? I have paid for and unlimited monthly service to Poland...therefore this should NOT be occurring!! I requested a response from RebTel as I needed to know what is going on or what I need to do to fix the problem! I need to call overseas as a matter of urgency  as I have a family emergency yet I can't contact my family because of the useless RebTel service!! Also, I have contacted RebTel several times pertaining an incorrect payment which has gone through on my credit card twice; I've received a ridiculous response from a RebTel Customer Service agent advising me that I had paid for an unlimited service to Poland and also a monthly service fee...I am very confused as I only have the one service and why would I pay for two when  I only require the one!! I have asked RebTel to clarify this matter for me and also either refund the second payment or advise me of an alternative. I've advised RebTel that if I don't get a response pertaining the payments I will be forced to contact my bank/credit provider and advise them to cancel the relevant payments!!I assured RebTel of my continued attention with relation to these matters but still have had NO RESPONSE!!!By the comments I have read here on TrustPilot it appears as though RebTel's reputation leaves a lot to be desired!!!It saddens me greatly to say this but  if you value your time and money then avoid this company at all costs! Sadly I would never recommend RebTel to anyone!! Very disappointing!!!

title: Overcharged without notice. Received compensation after this review.
text: Update: after back-and-forth messages with the customer service - I should point out that they assigned a different agent per email - I have received a compensation. Mind you, this only came about after days of having to explain and pressurizing their customer service agents.When you order a $10 meal off of a menu in a restaurant, how much do you expect to pay for it when you ask for the bill? In normal state of affairs,  you'd pay the price listed in the menu. But the same logic does not apply to Rebtel's service, which I found out through a first-hand experience. I come from Uzbekistan, and was pleased to learn that I could stay in touch with my family as Rebtel seemingly offered a very attractive rate to call numbers in the country: 0.023 EUR per minute. However, after a few calls it came to my attention that I was running out of credit way too quickly. Upon reviewing my activity log, I was disturbed to learn that the company had charged me between 0.23 to 1.34 EUR per minute on different calls to the exact same numbers. That is 10 and 58 times the rate which is indicated on the app - 0.023 EUR/min - which also conveniently shows up before I made the each call.  I quote from the customer service response to my inquiry regarding this matter: "I can assure you that we wanted to keep the same rates, but we were forced to increase them due to capacity issues and to be able to sustain the same level of quality."Going back to the restaurant comparison: in a similar scenario to the one I am experiencing with Rebtel, you'd be paying anywhere between $100 to $580 for the $10 meal you had ordered. And you would find that out only after you had eaten the damn food. The server would kindly inform you that "due to capacity issues" the meal you just ate got much more expensive now - so deal with it. No restaurant would be allowed to continue conducting business in this fraudulent manner, and neither should any company. Avoid this service if you do not feel like dealing with multiple customer service agents just to get your money back.
answer: Hi Umrbek!We can offer different rates for Uzbekistan. If you call to landline numbers, the rate we can offer is 0.023 EUR per minute but if you call to mobiles, you will pay 56 cents per minute. We can see that you are using our Windows Phone app and we have noticed this version of the app might not be showing the updated rates.We have updated your ticket 905270 including a compensation for the wrong information shown from our side. I have shared this feedback with our technical team to make the needed changes.Best regards./Fernando.

title: Fraud - took money from my account without adding the minutes or email and restricted my account which is already loaded with minutes and have denied me access to my already loaded account.
text: I have never been treated so badly by any service. I have been a customer with Rebtel for 6 years and never had cause to worry till April, 23rd 2010. They took money from my account (supposedly my monthly subscription charge) without an email or adding minutes to my account. I had a monthly subscription and it was all going well. I would get an email immediately it's gone through and also have the minutes loaded into my Rebtel account.My bank on the other hand has never alerted me of a fraud purchase but for this purchase they did. First thing I did before confirming it was a fraud was to check my inbox for an email and also my Rebtel account for the minutes purchased but to my bewilderment, there was no email sent, neither was there $15 worth minutes added to my account so I responded a "no" to my bank. It was a type yes or no answer if you recognize that purchase and an email or the purchased minutes in question, I didn't recognize that purchase.Rebtel went ahead to restrict my access to my account. I have not been able to use the $9 worth of minutes I already had in my account for almost two weeks.They clearly showed great detest stating that I should have notified them first before notifying my bank. I went to great lengths explaining to them that - this had never happened, - I didn't go to my bank, they reached out to me - I waited for hours to receive their email to confirm the payment,- I also asked them to check their records and see that I never got an email confirmation of my payment as is always the case.- I also said my minutes weren't added. They sent me emails insisting it was there. I have sent over 6 emails to them explaining but they have told me they will not give me access to my account unless I call my bank and admit the charge, get them to provide a written letter stating it was not a fraud and sent the letter to me. My entire friends and family who have also been in Rebtel for over 7 years are shocked.I have never been backmailed in my life and to think that I would betray my person considering also the services my bank provides me in protecting my account is just beyond me.Rebtel is basically punishing me for refusing to be blackmailed. After over 6 years of being on this service why would I jump up to create a dispute if they were no grounds? It was a clear fraud and I feel bad I have recommended them to all my family and friends in US and the UK? And for $15? I guess a smart way is to make me loose my $9 as well.Never leave your account details on file here if you want to keep enjoying this service.
answer: Hi Nadia!We have just updated your ticket 892623 giving you some more details about your case. From Rebtel we will always be happy to help with any issue or misunderstanding but we are not able to do so until the dispute is cancelled.In no way we are blackmailing you, we are just trying to find the best way to solve the issue. Once the dispute is cancelled we will make sure to review your case and compensate you for any inconveneince caused.We are really greatful for having you using our for 6 years and we will do our best to keep on offering you the best service possible./Fernando.

title: Do not use this service. False rates at the time of buying
text: As mentioned in previous reviews this company seem to think it is OK to change their call pricing after you paid for their service and without any prior notification. After submitting a request for a refund I got a reply telling me that they are doing their best to keep the prices but are forced to increase them due to capacity issues and to be able to sustain the same level of quality. This the worst case of cheating the customer as the money is taken upfront and the terms are changed after. Is done so sneakily - without notifying the customer as well. The amount I have given these people is not much, but I feel disgusted by such enterprises which feel can do this and hide behind their T&Cs (which I am sure they have for this type of situation). I hope that this review will discourage people from using this service as there are plenty of alternatives. I will see what my options are in terms of consumer rights and will take this up with Google Play support.

title: Scam
text: Hi folks,  please stay away from this company. I am a new rebtel client. Prices per min changing so quick and by huge difference on this platform. For example when I topped up by fiver on the day it showed my balance 200 min to one European country mobiles,  After three days showed only 8 min available. Price sky rocketing per min from 2,5c to 35c. Mad increased in price without any notification. I dont understand how this can happen??  This is  a joke or scam or what??? Also on the day i been offerd subscription unlimited calls for 7$per month to one european country. Now I dont see any subscription available particulary for that country at all. What I noticed  this crowd working so tricky and fools the people. They advertising and promoting product/service for one price, but at the end consumer gets absolutely different price. This matter  should be reported to consumer protection authorities this absolutely ilegal to act in the way they does. They should be sued for breaching consumer rights. My advice is  shop around for better service. THANKS
answer: Hi Skirtautas,Thanks for reaching out. We have located the ticket you sent us (#886506). We will investigate your case and will reply with more information very soon.Thanks for your patience!/Fernando.

title: Rude customer service
text: Please do not use this service. I had used it Rebtel for at least 3 years now, successfully only to wake up to the worst case scenario and an even worse customer service platform. They posted on their Facebook page that they couldn't connect calls. Of course I haven't even opened my own Facebook profile in years, how would I know, so I make calls unknowingly that Rebtel is not working. Mind you, voice system says everything it says on any other normal day, "Welcome to Rebel please enter the international number you want to call'" etc. So I call, I have topped up my account with about 500 minutes so I'm not even worried. I make my usual calls, to all my relatives, friends unknowingly. The next day I find out that instead of charging my Rebtel account as was supposed to happen all the calls (now I know it was due to their connectivity issues) of course AT&T picked them all up and now I had a $400 bill. After five days of trying to contact them, I wind up having to contact them through Facebook, and they end up saying oh we don't see any of your calls on our logs, well of course if your system was actually down you aren't going to see anything. Then they say we'll give you $20 credit as a sign of good faith. $400, $20 , good faith? Come on now. And then they try hide behind the issue of not interfering with third parties, no this is about how your system fooled me. At this point it's not even about just the bill, the emotional toll all this has taken on me is included. My email is tequiladube@ yahoo.com for anyone who wants more evidence against these thieves, or just wants to see proof about the monster I'm advising against.
answer: Hi Dube,Our technical team have been investigating your case and we would need some extra information. Please, be so kind to reply to the ticket 879576 and we will escalate your case.Thanks for your cooperation!/Fernando.

title: Recharging account
text: I liked their call quality but I could not recharge my account just all over sudden. Money was deducted from my account and still could not connect to their service. This time round I decided enough was enough and opted for another service.

We have contacted you via e-mail with more details about what happened and we refunded the credit that was not added in your account.Once again we apologize for the inconveniences caused and if there is something we can do for you, contact us in our new Facebook Support Page.Best regards./Fernando.

title: Unacceptable customer service
text: I have been using Rebtel for more than 5 years now.  About call quality, price - I have absolutely no complaint.  It was a smooth experience, until sometime in January 2016, when all changed.  Rebtel changed their website – for the worst possible experience for the customers.  I couldn’t access my account after successful login, and contacted the customer service on Feb 3rd of 2016. I received email from the support telling me how they can see I have logged in (after I have already mentioned that I could login and unable to access my account).  And then started emails every other day, suggesting me to try other browser, deleting cookies etc. – one email – one suggestion.  It took exactly 14 days for the issue to be fixed by their technical team.  Now the new saga – can’t edit my local numbers or add any other.  I contacted the customer service again.  After several emails, when I mentioned I only 19 local numbers and I am allowed 20, I get this email that I have 20 – now I have sent them screenshots.  I thought companies strive to get better – never thought will find one that is trying and achieving to get worse by leaps and bounds until Rebtel.  This is a prime example of what a customer service should never be.
answer: Hi Agomes,We are sorry if the experience with our Support department was not what you expected. I was unable to locate your account and your ticket number so please, send us a private message in our Facebook and I will be happy to review your case and help you getting access to all your local numbers.Thank you,Fernando.

title: Dropped calls to Cuba
text: I downloaded Rebtel on my iPhone to call my boyfriend in Cuba. To be fair for the last three years I have been using google voice and Cuballama both of which have dropped calls, and sometimes it's almost impossible to hear eachother - as seems to be the case for most Cuban communications. I had high hopes having read the reviews on using Rebtel to call Cuba and getting crystal clear connections. So far: most of the time when I call it doesn't even ring on his end, and it eventually (1.5 min or more of ringing) it takes me to a message from Verizon (my carrier) saying the call couldn't be completed. Once in a while it connects perfectly and I can hear him very well - the best so far. He can not hear me as well, one time he got clear reception of my voice. My problem is the few times we have successfully connected, a few minutes into the conversation it drops the call and then I cannot get it to connect to him again no matter how many times I try to reconnect. It's so frustrating. I usually cannot get it to ring through to him again until the next day - and then again only once and only for about 10 minutes before it drops the call and won't reconnect. Like I said I had high hopes. ;(
answer: Hi Jennifer.We have ways to improve the quality of the calls and avoid the issues you describe in your message. Please, contact us at support@rebtel.com specifying the number you have issues with and we will make the needed changes.Thank you!/Fernando.

title: Not a Happy Customer!!
text: I have been using Rebtel for about two years now and to be honest, did this out of laziness on my part to find another provider but having spoken with a few friends now, done with Rebtel for following reasons:-1. Too Expensive: - in this day and age when there are apps for calling for free and clearly, there simply is no justification for such high prices for calls.2. Despite length of time using rebtel, you would think there would be special loyalty discounts to those of us who have used their services for such extended periods. In this day and age where every business is finding ways of rewarding customer loyalty and offering all sorts, it seems all Rebtel is about, is people using its services and loyalty does not factor into the equation. Why then should anyone want to continue with such an organization if benefits are one-sided!!
answer: Hi Jo!In Rebtel we work to offer the best rates but without compromising the quality of your calls. Please, contact us with a private message in our Facebook page or in support@rebtel.com and we will explain how to get our best offers and promotions for the country you call to.Thanks for your review!Fernando.

title: My provieder in Belgium charged me for my calls to South Africa made via REBTEL
text: My provider in Belgium (Telenet) have charged me for all the calls I have made via 2  deals to South AfricaI purchased via REBTEL.  Calls which should have cost me €23,80 have now been charged to me for the amount of €361,10. My provider have rejected my request for investigation that the calls were made via a REBTEL contact number as on the REBTEL  site. I have subsequently mailed Rebtel and am waiting for an answer.   I cannot believe this has happened and have requested they pay my provider (refund me) for the costs incurred.  Just getting my money back that I have paid via credit card to REBTEL is not an option as the purchase was made in good faith so that I could call cheaply to South Africa.   I hope there is a procedure for REBTEL  to take their full responsibility for this problem as they have reputable reviews which I checked at length before signing up for their service.  I advise that REBTEL remove deals from their website to avoid other people becoming victims of the same fate as it is for a reason we use REBTEL. NOT to be charged by our providers. January I used REBTEL via a contact number in Brussels to contact South Africa and my provider did not charge me.  February they charged me for every call made.  I sent 2 mails to REBTEL support last night with  proof of my bill from my provider clearly stating the number I called was the number given on the site as a the contact number for the country I was calling which was +27 87 550 23 47;  and will have to wait the 48 hours it will take to get an answer. I hope REBTEL contact my provider to sort this out as there is nowhere I can find a telephone number for customer service as everything has to be done by mail.  I hope and trust REBTEL will  solve this as it a very unpleasant experience. I have always had good response from Patricia at customer service.  In the meantime do not make any calls using a REBTEL contact number in your destination country.  Your provider will charge you full price.  Now is the time for me and for all of us  to really rate REBTEL on their customer service and solving this problem.   It is when things go wrong that the reviews really count.  I will keep everyone posted on progress in this matter.
answer: Hi Heidi,We have located your case and we are currently investigating it with our technical team. If something went wrong with the way you were charged for your calls we will do our best to compensate you.Please, refer to the ticket 852586 for the follow up of your case, we will be contacting you very soon with more information.Thank you./Fernando.

title: Good, cheap, uninterrupted network and good service
text: Hi there,I had been using the Vonage service from United States to call my people in Asia-India and elsewhere, Australia or Dubai, Malaysia and Singapore though it was little expensive(every month charge will be fixed, 40-50$).However, I was disconnected from the network and I was looking for a cheap method to call India , from my cell phone itself. I had been seeing Rebtel ads but, I was initially apprehensive to use a new and unknown network and also was concerned about the reliability, money transactions etc. But, once I set up my account with the phone number, I found the ease of using it-U can set up local numbers for the international numbers you want to contact and also, dial in from the app whenever necessary, if u want to call any new no that is not stored.So, this is the first advantage. Secondly, they have quite a wide range of plans-depending on fixed and variable talk times. Also, the cost of using it is much reduced(for me, more than 3 times lesser) than the usual methods. If you use any other carrier /network like AT&T, I see their costs are always lil higher-about 5-10$ more for unlimited calls/mins.So, this way, these are the 2 main reasons, I would continue to use Rebtel for international calling, after my current 2 months usage.Also, I had an account registered on an earlier number which is not in service now. I was charged for the 2nd month cycle but, basically it was my mistake not to have deleted the account since, I forgot the pin. Later, one support representative has been kind enough to at least help me with deleting or not charging me for my old account. Only one thing, since, this company works out of Luxembourg, they delay a lil by a day or 2 while responding to ur customer service mails. But, they at least reply and are prompt in doing and trying to solve any issues.One more point is this service is available in UK, Dubai, Africa and other variety of places. They can may be expand their horizon.Good job. Happy customer...till now..!!! Congrats..and continue this way..Thanks

title: A new price hike to Ethiopia! Beware!!!
text: I was a loyal Rebtel customer for the past few years (about 4 years) and Rebtel has been a better choice for me. I even wrote an excellent review in the past concerning quality and great customer service compared to other services. The price has been an issue from the beginning until the recent outrageous hike made me update my review. Calling Ethiopia went from average 19 cents(US) up to 27 cents per minute. That is a difference of 8 cents per minute!! I was using a deal that allowed me to talk for 50 minutes with approximately $10. Now, $10 allows you to talk only for 34 minutes and that is 27 cents per minute. I have been sticking around after their price changes in the past ( partly due to the "deals") and the problem I had with my mobile carrier third party application issue but this time, I am leaving for good! A price hike like this is not acceptable and I will be posting this on social media so that other Ethiopians stop using this service. I know many people who are doing that already, thanks to free internet calls and more internet coverage to Ethiopia. Why should we pay this much in 2016? Bye Rebtel! I am cancelling my account as we speak. I will start by taking away my credit card information from my profile and try other services for this week. It is unfair.
answer: Hi Fitih!You can still purchase the Ethiopia deal you were using by following these steps:**On Rebtel.com**1.Log in to your account and click on your name/profile picture2.Under "Latest Deals" click "See more"3.Then use the search bar to find the deal of your choice**In the Rebtel App**1.Log in into the Rebtel App2.Click on settings, which is the last option of the [menu bar](https://www.rebtel.com/en/help/article/?id=216522257-where-can-i-find-the-menu-bar-iphoneandroid) 3.Then click on "Current Deals" and search for the deal of your choice.We hope this helps!/Fernando.If you have any issue please

title: Bad voice quality, and many other bad things
text: 1. Voice quality is poor, probably less than 2khz (worst than pstn), to the extent that occasionaly i end up redialing directly to be able to understand.2. Masked destination ringing. When dialing a number, you do not hear destination ringing, you hear some rebtel ring until  the other end picks up the phone. That means you do not know if the phone is closed, or rang. I am interested to have normal phone call where i hear whatever i hear when calling from normal phone.3. clunky application. No easy way to use access numbers.4. now no sms.5. a dialer is not supposed to be a nuclear reactor. Dialer is a dialer. Something that you can type a number and press dial. With options to copy paste modify the number. I dont need your assistance on finding the country code, i know what i want to call, so you should remove this stupid list of countries. One you have an app that works, and no one is complaining, just stick with it. I do not understand why you feel obliged and urged to invent the weel every now and then. It is a dialer - not a supersonic aircraft.Avoid this app.
answer: Hi,We simplified the way to call, you don't even need to dial any access or local numbers. Just save your contacts number in international format in the contact list native to your device, so when you open the Rebtel app in its contact list just tap the contact you wish to call and that's it.

title: Horrible Customer Service
text: I have been trying for weeks now to resolve an issue with Rebtel through emails. Normally what gets back to me are automatic generated responses, or responses in poor English with little resolution to the issues that I am having with my Rebtel account. If you are having any kind of issue with Rebtel, don't expect a prompt response or that you will be able to really talk with anyone about your issues. There is no customer service telephone number, and all of the responses about your issues will be slow. 4-5 days usually. I have had no other experience with Rebtel to make the think that it is different for anyone else. The most inconvenient part is that if you use Rebtel to make calls to Cuba like I do, that you can't talk with your friends or family until the issues are resolved because Rebtel unfortunatley is one of the few applications that will actually allow you to make calls to Cuba.That is the only reason I have tolerated their horrible and impersonal customer service.
answer: Hi Alene,We're terribly sorry you've had a negative experience with our customer support. Please give us the ticket number of your report to them and we'll make sure it's reviewed doing our best to solve any issue you have with our service. Thank you,Wanda.

title: Upside down logo - upside down everything!!

I've had brief 'brush-off' replies from Maribel, Zahid, Alexandra and Vilhelm, just stalling and not understanding the issue. Very poor. Like many on here, I also believe that unless they change it back immediately, we'll all be gone.And Wanda, no I was not given a ticket number as I contacted you via your website and since then via email. The original text (and subsequent title of each email) is: "Where are my numbers? Why on earth would you roll out a new look which doesn't even work??!!!! All I want is to make calls, not see a new stupid interface!"Wanda - this is for you to copy and paste in your reply:-I am sorry you've been having problems [insert issue here]. We are doing all we can to [insert lie here]. You can be assured that we are [make up some crap and type it in here].No I would not recommend Rebtel to anyone. You have been warned!!

Your ticket number is: 825567, it's the one through which you sent a message this morning. Our support team will look into it and get back to you soon.Wanda.

title: REBTEL is now so messed up
text: I am stunned with what Rebtel has done to itself. Everything has just gone wrong. I then went back into the local numbers directory to see whose number I could delete to free up space only to find out the numbers have been wrongly allocated. Now Paul's number is showing up under Steve's name and Steve's number is now someone else's. My goodness, you couldn't make up the upside down LOGO. I then selected to delete phone 2 and saw it ask for confirmation if I wanted to delete phone 3. Oh Lord!!!I have also read a lot of reviews and it is just so annoying when they reply asking you to send them a private message on facebook. C'mon!! Get a regular email. title: From fantastic to worse to worst
text: In my opinion, Rebtel is an excellent example, how a great idea and innovation becomes a true disaster. I was probably one of the first international users of Rebtel and registered my numbers in 3 different countries. I found it fantastic and recommended it to many of my friends. As a result I received several credits and enjoyed sort of free calling for a while - until, suddenly, the credits got an expiration date! It's like taking an award away, but also taking my motivation away to recommend it to more friends. And while I don't really care, when Rebtel changes it's lovable logo to an aggressive red and upside down logo for no reason, I do care, when one of the most practical services - to use SMS - is taken away. This is not only absolutely ridiculous, but also unacceptable to change the rules for a service, that people might have signed up for, just to use the option of sending SMS, because it is (besides email) the best way to communicate with people in very different time zones.Some more bad news: When I tried to change some of my current "local numbers", they were DELETED, which also meant in some cases, that I lost these numbers completely. But when I tried to add those again, that I still had in my contacts with corrected info, the system tells me, that I ran out of local numbers and cannot add any additional ones.And don't you wonder, why there is not even a link on their webpages to contact any customer service? In the beginnings of Rebtel I was even in touch with one of their founders, Jonas Lindroth, now everybody is hiding in anonymity. I guess, their is a reason for that ...Maybe someone answers at least here to the following question: As I will not use Rebtel anymore, as soon as I cannot send SMS, how do I get my money back, that is currently on my 3 accounts (US, Europe, SouthEast-Asia)?P.S. I totally agree with all the other reviewers here, specifically with Raul Perez. The "new" Rebtel is a total disaster.
answer: Hi,Thank you for your feedback, it's really important and valuable for us, although we're sorry to hear you're not pleased with the new Rebtel. You can always reach our support team at support@rebtel.com directly form your email or see the link to send a message from our webpage in the "help" section. You just need to be logged in to your account.Finally, you can also send us a private message through our Facebook page with your account details and we will forward it to our support people to take care of your needs.ThanksWanda.

title: extra charges by my phone company using rebtel app
text: As I was about to buy some credit from rebtel I saw a pop up message that said that I could try it 5 mins for free. Because I had a bad experience with similar companies in the past I thought it was a great idea so I clicked on the link which led me to their app that I had to download. I made the call using their app which clearly displayed the contact number and the time I had left. After many attempts( the person on the line couldn'thear me) I was told I had run out of credit that I should top up. Very annoyed by the whole thing I gave up and decided not to buy any credit from them. A few  days after that experience my phone company sent me an update of my usage since my last bill and I see that I had been charged for those mins of international calls I made using rebtel's app.  Alarmed I tried to contact rebtel but little did I know that they didn't even have a contact number or a customer service email address. Not only was I not able to speak to the person I was trying to call but now I'm left with a telephone bill for those international minutes which is about 1/3 of my normal monthly bill. Very disappointing,  misleading and dishonest that rebtel company.
answer: Hi Koko,We would like to review your case and guide you on how to use our service without being charged. Remember that if you use our app, you can make calls through WiFi to avoid these charges. Send us the number you registered in Rebtel in a private message in our Rebtel Help page in Facebook and we will help you with anynquestion or doubt you might have.Thanks!Fernando.

title: Rebtel is stilling ur money-people should learn from us what happened

This month, after two years of money lost, we discovered that Rebtel were charging us 29 cents per minute. you see how stupid people are their steeling your money. we never checked the rate each time they charged us, what we did was; just keep adding funds and calling to Ethiopia. When I contacted them to learn how that happened, they promised me not to happen again that never fixed. our action were cut off their service.

title: Sevice Quality Deteriorated  NO Customer Service
text: I had been using Rebtel for 5 years.  Their prices are ok, not the best.  For a period early on on calls to Ukraine from USA the call quality was poor and I was disconnected several times.  I emailed customer service and they switched satellites or something and the call quality got better.  Rebtel did NOT offer any credit or free call time as a concession for the poor service and disconnected calls.  Other international phone companies always did SOMETHING to make it up to me in the past.Service was ok for about a year.  Still not the best prices.  Then,  calls would be disconnected in about 10 seconds when calling a land line in Ukraine.  Mobile phones were ok.  I tried contacting Rebtel...... their customer service link on their Website did not work.  I cancelled the Rebtel auto-refill immediately and found a better carrier.I left the above review and Rebtel's reply was to answer on Facebook.  I don't use Facebook.
answer: Hi Brian,We'd like to check your account and do our best to improve your experience.If you don't use Facebook then please contact our support agents at support@rebtel.com providing your account details and we will gladly look into the issue.Thank you!/Wanda.

answer: Hi Veera, We look at multiple criteria to check for what we define as commercial use. One of the criterion is unique numbers call in the past 30 days. If you have used the service only for personal use you can still contact us at support@rebtel.com and we will double check. Thank you for your review. /Sacha

title: Unacceptable response on queries & Unlimited plans are real cheating
text: Unacceptable response on queries & Unlimited plans are real cheating.I have been using Rebtel India Unlimited Plans. I have my mom number as Local number so I use to call her a lot. But from last week I was not able to call her stating "You have crossed the monthly unique number you can call"I tried to reach customer (Worst thing they can be contacted only by email). My questions like 1. When my monthly billing cycle starts and ends? - No response for this question after 4 emails2. What is the Unique limit for calling? No response for this question after 4 emails3. Why it is not quoted in anywhere? No response for this as well.Only Response I got twice"You have exceeded the limit of unique phone numbers you can call this month. Please note that Rebtel's unlimited calling plans are meant for private, non-commercial purposes only. You may still call the numbers you have called up until now."Worst and frustrating response.
answer: Hi Arun, Sorry to hear that you have been issues with the Rebtel service. 1. Once you buy India Unlimited it is the day your subscription is activated. The subscription is then 30 days long and starts over.2. We look at multiple criteria to check for what we define as commercial use. One of the criterion is unique numbers call in the past 30 days. If the calling behavior is identified as being out of the ordinary patterns of personal usage on the same plan, we than tag it as potential misusage. 3. You can find more information here : http://www.rebtel.com/en/Legal-information/Terms-of-service/If you only used for personal use please contact us again at support@rebtel.com we will then double check. Please note you can still call the numbers you call previously even after you get this message. Thank you. /Sacha

title: Useless
text: First - They might already have an account for you even though you never created one! (So me and my friend never got the intro bonus even though she referred me to Rebtel and never heard of it before)Second - Cannot pay for your account anymore if you used "multiple" cards for payments! Can you believe this? So, every time we will need to remember the card that was used for last payment!!Third - They accuse me of creating "Multiple Accounts" since I recharged mine and husband's Rebtel account with my credit card!Duh, don't we have single account for one phone number? How does it matter if my card is used to pay for my family!!Now, I cannot buy any plans unless I have a PayPal account!This service is definitely a headache and more useless since they have too many problems, but no customer support number to talk to solve those! Just email them and no guarantee that anyone will reply..
answer: Hi Amita, I am sorry to hear you have had bad experiences with Rebtel. First, accounts should not created unless you sign-up for the service or you have been referred by your a friend. I would suggest contacting support again and asking them how and when was your account created.When it comes to accepting multiple credit cards, this is a security issue. This measure is taken to prevent people using cards that do not belong to them to make payments. We understand that this is an issue for you and apologize that it cannot be easier in your specific case. When it comes to your last issue, you can have one account for up to 5 different numbers. If you want to check how to add a number to your account please read the following article: http://www.rebtel.com/en/Get-Help/Zendesk/#/hc/en-us/articles/200194106-How-Can-I-Add-Another-Number-To-My-Account-I hope this clarifies some of the issues you have been having. Thank you very much for taking the time to contact us. /Sacha

title: Excellent until...
text: I talk to overseas people, mostly in Africa, for almost 2,000 minutes a month. I used 'phone cards until I realised their published rates only applied for the first 4 minutes of each call--then rates sky-rocket! It is very sneaky, this detail is in the small print. You may think you are paying, say, 9p/minute but you are likely to be paying 20-30p/minute.So I was delighted to find Rebtel, which did not engage in this underhand practice. With no card number to enter, Rebtel was easier to use and the ability to allocate a UK number to frequently called overseas numbers was brilliant. With Rebtel calling abroad whilst driving became easy.After a few months of being very happy with Rebtel (call quality is generally better than calling cards too), I noticed the cost of calls to Zambia had suddenly tripled! No notification, nothing. Needless to say, I no longer use Rebtel.Rebtel is a very good service but check the rates charged and keep checking--don't get caught out as I did.
answer: Hi William, We apologize if you have not been notified of the price increase. We always try our best to reach every customer when a price increase is occurring. title: Worst audio quality. Use of illegal international call termination via internet and GSM Boxes
text: Here is why I don't think Rebtel is using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation exclusively for terminating calls in Ethiopia. Two Scenarios1. Rebtel Call From USA to Ethiopia (terminated using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation)    * Call is good quality    * Phone in Ethiopia show caller Id of my USA number2. Rebtel Call From USA to Ethiopia (terminated NOT using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation)    * Call is bad quality(might even drop)    * Phone in Ethiopia show caller Id of local Ethiopian Mobile Number as if its a local callI believe this second scenario happens because call is terminated using internet so bypassing Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation and generating a local call using local Ethiopian Mobile Number to the destination number. Sometimes I even hear the exact unique 'your account is low' message (not the Rebtel message) used by  Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation as if I am calling from Ethiopian Mobile phone with low account.  The people I call in Ethiopia are confused to get a call from local Ethiopian Mobile number but talk to me (from USA).  My point is this second scenario does not happen if all Rebtel calls are terminated using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation.The first thing I check when I place a call using Rebtel is ask the person I call if the number they get a call from is from my USA phone or local phone number. If it is my USA number, then great. If not and the caller Id is the local Ethiopian number, I am redialing again, because its bad quality and no use to continue with that call. I am clear that Rebtel uses different provider to route call. That is not the issue. The issue here is, which ever provider you choose should terminate calls using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation.You have been giving me general answers and not addressing the issue (Scenario 2). Rebtel Calls are being terminated illegally in Ethiopia. But I am glad you recognize "Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation" is the only legal telecom provider in Ethiopia. Second Step is to weed out the providers that don't terminate calls using Ethiopian Telecommunication Corporation.Thank you
answer: Hi Tesfamariam, We only use the best quality lines in order to give good quality calling to our users. If you have had quality issues please do contact us at support@rebtel.com and we will investigate the matter. Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review. /Sacha

Lucky I found out there are many phone apps now that enable you to talk on the phone overseas like "Line" is good to use it as phone talking. I love WeChat for text messaging, Line's phone quality is better but you can try both. The video & talk not very smooth I guess depends on both connection.Goodbye Rebtel.  That's all the money you will ever got from me :P

title: Mixed Experience
text: I have been Rebtel customer for long time. It is more than 3 years I have been a regular customer of Rebtel. Before last week I always had a good experience about their quality of service, both technical service and customer service. I have recommended rebtel to my family members and friends in the past.Recently I had a bad experience.The support was poor for the first time. I recently changed my phone number. Therefore, I requested to transfer my money from old number to new number. There was  partial money from reference bonus. Ms.  Laura was customer agent from Rebtel end. She said that bonus credit is not transferable. It was absolutely fine if that is the Rebtel policy. I did not know Rebtel policy. So, I made my request and as a customer agent her job was to explain me nicely what can be done or cannot be done based on Rebtel Policy. However, in stead of nicely explaining me, she started to blame me that I am abusing and misusing. The terms "abuse" and "misuse" were very insulting and objectionable, especially when it was baseless and with an old customer.  It was very unprofessional behavior of Ms. Laura from Rebtel end. Then she threatened me to block my account in future.  Her whole message was rude, non-sense and unprofessional. I expressed my dissatisfaction about her rude language in response email. She never asked apology for this rude behavior.In the past I had opportunity to communicate with Ms. Cintia and Ms. Alexandra,who are very nice and professional but Ms. Laura was unlike them from Rebtel. It was a bad experience.   It gave me the feelings that Rebtel does not care their customers.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Thank You so much for the reply. I feel much better to see your reply. I am not sure about the facebook page. So, i am replying here. The case number was Request #709001. Just to clarify once again, I have no complain about not transferring the bonus credit. I did not know Rebtel's policy about bonus credit.  I HAVE complain because she behaved rude with me by using terms "abuse", "misuse" and by saying "she would block my account in future."  That was an unacceptable treatment to a customer of more than 3 years old and who regularly use Rebtel by paying money every month.  The complain is about her behavior.Thank You once again.... :)
answer: Hi Shuva,Thank you for giving us your ticket number. I've reached out to our Support Manager and also our Support Team Leader so they can review  your case with the agents involved and how to best approach and explain circumstances to our users.Once more, thanks and please do not hesitate to contact us if you need us again. Best,/Wanda.

text: To start with I am with rebtel for a couple of months. Everything was hunky dory. They introduced "Unlimited calling" worth for 30 days to call India. It worked for a day. After that, I get a message "Your account balance is too low. Please add more credit."day 1) Raised a support ticketday 2) Support came back asking me to give an example.day 3) I gave them all the details that rebtel wanted.day 4) No responseday 5) Asked for a response again.day 5) Rebtel support responded (within 48 hours). Created a local number for the example I mentioned an day 3. Wait a minute, I gave a example as support asked. Nothing is working. Not the example alone. Icing on the top was, the local number they gave, did not work again. Same message, credit more money. They also told me that as a policy they will respond within 48 hours.on Day (5), I Responded to rebtel that their "Local access number" itself is not working. That is what I meant in day (1) report.day 6 and 7) No response. Where is their 48 hours policy to respond to customers?It has been well past 48 hours since i responded to rebtel support.I think this company rolls out products without testing. If the stuff works for you, good. If it does not, your are by yourself and you are in for a wild ride. Their support is extremely unhelpful. They try to pass the ball without taking accountability. I have easily spent many hours worth of effort fighting with something that should just work. Their support is miserable. Please let me know if there are choices that I can do. (a) I could call credit card company to refund the payment. (b) I can create awareness of this company to my friends.Note: I am ready corroborate the entire incident via email chain.Update 1:It has been two more days. No response to support email also.

title: I have purchased but still "Your account balance is too low."
text: I have purchased 5dollar and have total 7,50 dollar left , not used them, but when I try to make a call, I get the message, "Your account balance is too low." The website is in spanish i think .
answer: Hi Said, I can see you have two accounts and in both you initiated payments of 5usd but none was completed therefore the credit wasn't added.In one of the accounts indeed you have 7.80usd and there's no obvious reason as why you can't call. First of all please make sure you're trying to call from the number registered in the account that does have credit and not from the number registered in the empty account. If you're calling from the correct number, then it could be that you're trying to call using local minutes instead of internet and if you don't have enough credit with your local provider the call can't be placed; so please try placing a call via internet and if it goes through then that's the reason.If you have enough credit locally and can't call using internet either, please contact support@rebtel.com and we will gladly look into it and do our best to fix it. You can change the language in your account by going to your account click on your name/ settings and select language.The website can be language selected as well at the bottom of the page. /Wanda.

answer: Hi Leonor, We are really sorry if you've faced some issues with our service, we are always available to investigate and do our best to solve any issue. Please contact support@rebtel.com with the details of the case and we will do our best to clarify any misunderstanding. /Wanda.

title: Rebtel is not working in Spain and results in double payments
text: I am living in Spain and have downloaded Rebtel on my smartphone recently. After making my first phone calls I received my bill from my mobile phone Provider (Orange) and had to pay € 17 extra for just 4 calls.Although the calls were transfered through a local number in Madrid I had to pay double for using Rebtel. After informing the helpdesk of Rebtel twice  I did not get any answer. Rebtel  seems to be a clear cheat  to me.regards Hans van MaanenAfter 3 times sending an e-mail to Rebtel help desk I am still waiting for a proper answer on my questions !!This the 4th reaction of Rebtel in which they do not answer the questuion. As I have mentioned in my review I DID DOWNLOADED THE REBTEL APP  and iI hav made the calls through the RepteL app and WiFi !!. But still I was charged !!! twice by ORANGE € includid IVA almost € 17 for 5 calls and by Repted the normal charge.  The Question is Orange aloud to do this and if so then the Rebtel App is of no use to me in Spain !!!My mail addrees is known at Rebtel, since I have send already 3 e-mails.
answer: Hi Hans,When you call internationally through Rebtel by calling your access number or local number, you place a local call first then we will route your call internationally to your contact. This means that you pay your phone operator for the price of the local call and the international, Rebtel-carried part is charged through us, on your pre-paid Rebtel account. If you want to save the cost of the local call then you could place your calls via Wi-Fi or 3G through one of our apps for Android or iPhone.In order to help you further with your issue, please, be so kind to write to us to our e-mail support@rebtel.com providing us your registered telephone number with international format and a copy of your phone bill in PDF.Thanks in advance for your cooperation /Cintia

Unfortunately a big part the cost or rate is  based on the cost that the local provider establish to connect the calls in its country, in the case of Cuba the local provider rates are high and that's why no matter from where in the world you're calling from, it's expensive to call to Cuba. Hopefully in the near future calling that destination would be cheaper, in the meantime we try to offer you  the best option available. /Wanda.
